{# sent to a user who resets their password #}

      a:hover{outline:0}

      .btn-primary:active{background-image:none}
      .btn:active{background-image:none}
      :after{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}
      :before{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}
      a:focus{color:#00618a;text-decoration:underline}
      a:hover{color:#00618a;text-decoration:underline}
      a:focus{outline:dotted thin;outline:-webkit-focus-ring-color auto 5px;outline-offset:-2px}
      .form-control::-moz-placeholder{opacity:1;color:#999;font-style:italic}
      .form-control:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#999;font-style:italic}
      .form-control:-moz-placeholder{color:#999;font-style:italic}
      .form-control::-ms-expand{border:0;background-color:transparent}
      .btn:active:focus{outline:dotted thin;outline:-webkit-focus-ring-color auto 5px;outline-offset:-2px}
      .btn:focus{outline:dotted thin;outline:-webkit-focus-ring-color auto 5px;outline-offset:-2px}
      .btn:focus{color:#4d5258;text-decoration:none}
      .btn:hover{color:#4d5258;text-decoration:none}
      .btn:active{outline:0;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 3px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.125);box-shadow:inset 0 3px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.125)}
      .btn-primary:focus{color:#fff;background-color:#00649c;border-color:#00141d}

      .btn-primary:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#00649c;border-color:#00435f}

      .container:before{content:" ";display:table}
      .container:after{clear:both}
      .fa-anchor:before{content:"\f13d"}

      @media print {
        *,
        :after,
        :before {
          background: 0 0!important;
          color: #000!important;
          box-shadow: none!important;
          text-shadow: none!important;
        }
        a,
        a:visited {
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        a[href]:after {
          content: " (" attr(href) ")";
        }
        a[href^="#"]:after {
          content: "";
        }
        p {
          orphans: 3;
          widows: 3;
        }
      }
